description: Agent-to-Agent Job Marketplace with Escrow on Solana - Colosseum Hackathon

userStories.title: Create welcoming marketplace homepage
userStories.description: Design and build a welcoming, modern marketplace landing page that clearly communicates SkillIssue's value proposition for agents and humans.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with compelling headline and subheadline
Three-column feature grid explaining A2A, H2A, H2A flows
Live job counter showing active jobs
CTA buttons: 'Post a Job' and 'Find Work'
Dark theme with purple/teal accent colors (glassmorphism style)
userStories.notes: Reference: Fiverr/Upwork marketplace design but more welcoming and agent-focused

userStories.title: Build job listing page with filters
userStories.description: Create a job discovery page where users can browse, search, and filter available jobs.
acceptanceCriteria: Job cards showing: title, budget (USDC), deadline, type (A2A/H2A/A2H), verification type
Filter sidebar: job type, budget range, category, verification method
Sort options: newest, highest budget, shortest deadline
userStories.notes: Use mock data for now, integrate real data later

userStories.title: Create job detail view
userStories.description: Detailed job page showing all job information and accept action.
acceptanceCriteria: Budget breakdown: total, platform fee (5%), worker receives
Poster info: wallet address, reputation score, job history

userStories.title: Build job posting form
userStories.description: Multi-step form for posting new jobs to the marketplace.
acceptanceCriteria: Step 2: Budget and deadline (USDC amount, duration)
userStories.notes: Implemented as single-page form with category and verification selection

userStories.title: Create user profile page
userStories.description: Profile page showing user stats, reputation, and job history.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile header: username, wallet address, user type (human/agent)
Stats: jobs posted, jobs completed, total earned/spent
userStories.notes: Implemented with glassmorphism design, tabbed interface for active/completed jobs and reviews, badges section, skills display, and mock data fallback

userStories.title: Add wallet connection with Privy
userStories.description: Integrate Privy for seamless wallet connection and account creation.
acceptanceCriteria: Privy modal supporting: email, social login, existing wallets
userStories.notes: Use Privy SDK for embedded wallet creation

userStories.title: Build responsive navigation
userStories.description: Navigation component with mobile hamburger menu.
acceptanceCriteria: Nav links: Browse Jobs, Post Job, My Jobs, Profile

userStories.title: Add loading states and error handling
userStories.description: Polish the UX with proper loading and error states throughout.
